reqs:
Pre-reqs: (Third-year standing in a physics honours program or fourth-year standing in a physics or astronomy major program.)
WAIT LIST
SINCE SECTION 10W IS A WAITLIST ONLY, A PLACE IN SECTION 10W DOES NOT GUARANTEE A PLACE IN PHYS 348.
description: Current research topics in physics and astronomy are investigated and explored. Technical communication and research skills are studied and developed via oral presentations and written scientific reports on these current research topics.
